item.title: Immunology Has A Problem With Researcher Degrees of Freedom
item.description: Two scientists performing science. from the-scientist.com, July 2011 I just got back from the annual meeting of the Society for the Improvement of Psychological Science (SIPS) and had a great time talking to a number of psychologists looking to help promote open, reproducible science. It really got me thinking about all the different kinds of science Iâ€™ve been a part of in my undergraduate and graduate career. For a very long time I was a cellular biologist.
